title: I have issues when talking handsfree via bluetooth in my car (new BMW). Can't hear 1st 3 seconds
content:
I can't hear first 3 seconds of the other party when connected via Bluetooth handsfree in my 2019 BMW. It worked perfectly with a Google Pixel 3 and works perfectly with my partners Samsung Galaxy S21. It occurs when the other party is not talking and when they do the first 3 seconds cannot be heard throughout the phone call.

I've reset the bluetooth to no avail.
